title: Weather Dashboard
description: A weather application that allows you to search for a city, view the current five-day forecast of the searched city, and view your search history.
technologies: HTML, CSS, Bootstrap, JavaScript, Local Storage, OpenWeather API

title: Work-Day-Scheduler
description: A daily work calendar that allows the user to save their to-dos in specific time slots. As the day progresses the time slots change color to show if the slot is in the past, present or future.
technologies: HTML, CSS, Bootstrap, JavaScript, Local Storage, Moment.js

title: Book-Finder
description: The Book Finder app is a MERN application that utilizes React components, helper/util functions, React lifecycle methods to query and display books based on user searches. Node, Express, and MongoDB were also used to allow users to save searched books to review or purchase later.
technologies: React.js, CSS, Bootstrap, JavaScript/jQuery, Google Books API, Express, Node.js, MongoDB

title: Note-Taker
description: A note-taking application for users that need to keep track of a lot of information. The application allows the user to take notes and have written information available when needed.
technologies: HTML, CSS, Bootstrap, JavaScript, Express, Node.js, UUID

title: Flavor Savor
description: A group project to build a recipe application that finds recipes based on what food item the user searches for. The search displays a list of recipes, a link to the recipe, and a picture of the meal.
technologies: HTML, CSS, Bulma, Javascript, Glide.js, Edamam API, Giphys API
